Name: Sex Adventures - The SPA
About the game: A visual novel about a young woman's naughty adventures at her favorite SPA. Visual Novel Description Yuki, a very attractive Asian woman, remained alone over the weekend, while her husband was out of town with work. Wearing a revealing dress, she went to the SPA she frequented quite often. The receptionist reminded her once again of the rules to follow and asked her to keep secret everything that happens inside. Yuki and her partner are very open minded and they enjoy life at its fullest, but they made a deal. She can have fun with other women as much as she likes, but she's not allowed to sleep with other men. Will Yuki remain faithful? Or will she break her promise? Let's find out together what she is doing without her husband by her side and who will be her first conquest.
